title: Material Classification and Multiple Intelligence-Based Constructivist Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of foundational science concepts and recognition of basic material properties
context.additional_context: Learners consisting of medical/legal/technical professionals, emphasizing BYOD environments and social domain application cases

learning_goals: Learners can explain the physical properties of solids, liquids, and gases through multiple intelligence activities (visual-spatial, linguistic, logical-mathematical)
Learners can analyze phase changes of matter using concept maps and animations and apply them to social phenomena (e.g., resource management)
Learners can design a protocol to solve material classification problems by collaborating with peers using a constructivist approach.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
